article_title: Gov. Rick Scott stands by two misleading campaign ads on Obamacare
article_text: The insurance company at the center of Scott’s claim, Florida Blue, said in an email that the Affordable Care Act has not resulted in 300,000 of its customers being forced out of their plans.

article_metadata.title: Gov. Rick Scott stands by two misleading campaign ads on Obamacare | Miami Herald
